AuthenticationHelp: This page allows you to manage your wallets, emails, and other authentication settings.
ChangePasswordBeforeLogin: Before signing in, please follow the link sent to your email to change your password.
CommandPaletteHelp:
Use this dialog to quickly navigate to other pages.

It can be opened at any time by entering CTRL + P.
CommandPalettePlaceholder: Search content and quickly navigate the site
CommandPaletteTitle: What would you like to do?
CompleteVerificationInEmail: Open our email to complete verification.
ContactHelpCode: View our open-source code on GitHub
CreateApiDescription: Create an API to communicate with in your routines
CreateNoteDescription: Write down your thoughts, ideas, & more
CreateOrganizationDescription: Invite members to collaborate on projects, routines, & more
CreateQuestionDescription: Ask a question to the community
CreateReminderDescription: Set a reminder to do something
CreateSmartContractDescription: Create a smart contract to use in your routines
CreateStandardDescription: Create a standard to use in your routines
DeleteCommentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.
DisplayPreferencesHelp: Display preferences customize the look and feel of the app. More customizations will be available in the near future.
EmailDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete email "{{emailAddress}}"?
FoundTopicsInFavAndHidden: Topics found in both "Favorites" and "Hidden" have been removed from "Hidden".
InputContainerHelp:
Inputs specify the information required to complete a routine.

For example, a routine for creating a business entity might require its name, mission statement, wallet address, and a logo.

An input may also be associated with a standard, which specifies the shape of data that is expected to be entered. This is used to generate a form component when executing the routine manually, or to ensure interoperability with other rotines when executing the routine automatically.

Inputs and outputs with the same identifier and standard can be reused in different subroutines.
EmailInUseWrongPassword: Email is in use. Did you forget your password?
MarkedInternal: Marked as internal. Only the owner can use this.
NodeMoveDialogHelp:
This dialog allows you to move a node to a new position.

Nodes are positioned using "column" and "row" coordinates.
OutputContainerHelp:
Outputs specify the information that is generated by a routine.

For example, a routine for creating a business entity might generate a governance token.

Outputs may either be sent to the Vrooli protocol, or stored as a reference to another location. The governance token, for example, would be sent directly to the business's wallet address. This means the output would be JSON indicating the object type and token's address.

Outputs and inputs with the same identifier and standard can be reused in different subroutines.
ParentOverrideConfirm: Selecting a parent to copy will override existing data. Continue?
ReportsHelp:
Reports are used for community moderation.

If you see content that is misleading, illegal, exposes personal information, or otherwise seems inappropriate, please create a report if one does not already exist.

You can also vote on existing reports and suggest actions to take.

Reporting and contributing to reports can increase your reputation score.
RoutineInputsDeleteConfirm: This will delete the inputs and outputs. Are you sure you want to continue?
RunDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this run from {{startDate}} with {{percentComplete}}% completed?
RunInvalidRoutineConfirm: This routine is incomplete. Are you sure you want to run it?
RunStopConfirm: Are you sure you want to stop this routine? You can continue it later.
SaveChangesBeforeLeaving: Please save or discard changes before leaving.
SelectOrCreateDialogHelp:
This dialog allows you to connect a new or existing {{objectType}} to an object.

If you do not own the selected object, the owner will have to approve the connection.
SelectOrCreateSubroutineDialogHelp: This dialog allows you to connect a new or existing subroutine. Each subroutine becomes a page when executing the routine (or if it contains its own subroutines, then those subroutines become pages).
SubroutineGraphDeleteConfirm: This will delete the subroutine graph. Are you sure you want to continue?
UnsavedChangesBeforeCancel: There are unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to cancel?
UpdateProfileHelp:
This page allows you to update your profile, including your name, handle, and bio.

Handles are unique, and handled (pun intended) by the [ADA Handle Protocol](https://adahandle.com/). This allows for handle to be used across many Cardano applications, and exchanged with others on an open market.

To use an ADA Handle, make sure it is in a wallet which is authenticated with your account.

If you set a handle, your Vrooli profile will be accessible via https://app.vrooli.com/profile/{handle}.

Your bio is displayed on your profile page. You may add multiple translations if you'd like.
WalletDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete wallet "{{walletName}}"?
WelcomeVerifyEmail: Welcome to {{appName}}! Please verify your email within 48 hours.
